title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 56/88 of 7 January 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1678/85 as regards the agricultural conversion rates for the pigmeat sector in Greece
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 56/88
of 7 January 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1678/85 as regards the agricultural conversion rates for the pigmeat sector in Greece
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Annex IV to Regulation (EEC) No 1678/85, as amended by Regulation (EEC) No 3814/87, the line relating to pigmeat is hereby replaced by the following:
1.2,5 //  //  // Products  // Agricultural conversion rates  //  //  // 1.2.3.4.5 //  // 1 ECU = . . . Dra   // Applicable until  // 1 ECU = . . . Dra   // Applicable for  //  //  //  //  //  // 'Pigmeat   // 132,397   // 10. 1. 1988  // 133,321   // 11. 1. 1988   //    //   //   //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 11 January 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 January 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 182, 3. 7. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 11.
(4) OJ No L 365, 24. 12. 1987, p. 13.
(5) OJ No L 357, 19. 12. 1987, p. 22.
(6) OJ No L 310, 21. 11. 1985, p. 4.
